subject: Football (College)
Names, Personal
lead_paragraph: The Bear Bryant Namesake Reunion, held on the day of Alabama’s home opener, brought together 94 people registered as being named after the legendary Crimson Tide football coach.
snippet: The Bear Bryant Namesake Reunion, held on the day of Alabama’s home opener, brought together 94 people registered as being named after the legendary Crimson Tide football coach.
